General.Name: DT&C Co. Ltd
General.Description: DT&C.Co.Ltd provides testing and certification services. It offers services in the areas of electrical safety, energy efficiency, electronic electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) testing, automotive EMC, basic industry EMC, RF/SAR, and reliability test. DT&C.Co.Ltd was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
